mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(product_image SEPARATOR ',') AS product_images, product_images.product_images_seq, products.product_id, products.product_name, products.product_info_image, products.consumer_price, products.supply_price, products.selling_price, products.isbn, products.author_introduction, product_images.product_image, products.author_translator, products.original_author, products.illustrator, products.publisher, products.publication_date, products.page_count, products.size, products.total_volume, products.author_introduction, products.introduction_intro, products.introduction_detail, products.table_of_contents, products.notification_subscription, products.best_seller_status, products.category_key FROM product_images INNER JOIN products ON product_images.product_id = products.product_id WHERE products.product_id = #{productId}
